indiyawe agamathi narendra modi mahathageth shri lanka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathageth sithuwili ha deshapalana gaman margawala athi samanakamath dedena athara athi hithawathkamath hethuwen idiriyedi derata athara wada sadhaniya ha yahapath rajya thanthrika sabandathawak pawathwa gena yamata hakiwanu athayi janamadhya ha prawruththi amathi keheliya rambaukwalla mahatha pawasayi.narendra modi mahathata loka rajya nayakayan athurin mulin suba pathu rajya nayakaya bawata pathwuye shri lanka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha bawada, meratata paminena men modi mahathata ehidi janadhipathithuma aaradhanawak kala bawada hethema pawasiya.kabinat thirana danumdima sandaha janamadhya ha prawruththi amathyansha shrawanagaraye eeye (19) pawathi madhaya hamuwedi madhyawediyaku mathukala prashnayakata pilithuru demin amathiwaraya me bawa pawasiya.narendra modi mahatha menma janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha da athi wishala bahuthara chanda sankhyawak laba rate palana balaya himikaraganima dedena athara kapi penena samanakamak yayida amathiwaraya mehidi penwa dunneya.indiyawe shakthimath rajayak bihiwima shri lankawata pahasuwak wanu athayi ki amathiwaraya, ee anuwa indiyawe aluthin pihituwana rajaya samanga shri lanka rajaya wadath subawadi andamin adahas huwamaru kara ganimata apeksha karana bawada kiweya.indiyawe meyata pera balayata pathwu sama aanduwakata ma thindu thirana ganimedi thamilnaduwa da athulu thawath boho prantha aanduwala balapamwalata yatath wimata siduwuwath modi mahathage rajayata ewani balapamwalata yatath wimata sidu nowana bawada penwa dunneya.
